column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Thank goodness you 're all okay . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " I was able to rescue her soul , but she was n't ready to return to her body yet .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Were you able to stop Unalaq and Vaatu ?
#Text=They fused , then Vaatu ripped Raava right out of me and destroyed her .
#Text=I am too young to live through ten thousand years of darkness .
#Text=Korra , ca n't you talk to one of your past lives or something ?
#Text=" Korra says : " When Vaatu destroyed Raava , he destroyed my connection to the past Avatars too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " If that 's true , then - " Korra says : " The cycle is over .
